#summary Links to useful datasheets.
#labels Featured

Below are categorized links to useful component datasheets related to the OpenDSO project:

=ADC (Analog to Digital Converters)=
Here are all the ADCs found matching the following criterions:
 * Listed by at least one of the global Internet electronic part suppliers (Arrow, Digikey, Farnell/Newark, Future, Mouser and RS):
 * 8/10 bit resolution
 * 100 to 999 MSPS
 * Single or dual channel

A more detailed [https://spreadsheets.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0ArHvhrQgpLZFdGlrOGh0TnkwcDZHakdsX2FlV3oydHc&hl=en_US comparison spreadsheet] is available on Google Docs (don't forget to select either the "Single ADC" or the "Dual ADC" tab at the bottom of the page!).
